title: A new song, called Jacke Doues resolution by which he doth show, that he cares not a rush how ere the world goe. To the tune of, To driue the cold winter away.
author: G. B., fl. 1592-1597.
publicationStmtPublisher: for Iohn Wright and are to be sold at his shop in Giltspur-street at the signe of the Bible,
